sub_title: International Finance Executive: FP&A | Finance Transformation | M&A | Finance & Programme Mgmt | Reporting & Control
summary:
As a global finance executive, I have strong and broad experience driving business value, transforming finance organisations, growing people and building teams.

I have a proven track record with complex, blue-chip, multi-national corporations in the Logistics Services (Supply Chain Management), Logistics Infrastructure, Manufacturing and FMCG sectors. 

With a structured and analytical approach, I quickly clarify complex issues, identify root causes and bring focus, prioritization, action and results. As Regional CFO, I combine my strong technical foundation in reporting, control and acquisition integration, with planning and analysis experience as global head of FP&A to lead the finance functions across EMEA.

As a strategic business partner, I work closely with regional CEOs and management teams in sales, operations, and procurement to drive growth, margins and cash flow. My ability to combine a strategic outlook with hands-on execution has contributed to successful business turnarounds, and delivered top-line growth whilst improving results through cost controls and restructuring. I’ve driven improved productivity and margins by close collaboration with operational management and sales/commercial functions, as well as directing $100M+ working capital improvement programmes.

I have driven finance transformation by offshoring, centralisation and standardisation of processes, and the development of value-added business-partnering.  By redesigning and improving the reporting and internal control processes, I ensured reliable, on-time and quality deliverables within a no-surprises culture.

I have a strong track record of people development, having built and motivated large direct and indirect distributed teams across Europe and Asia, including a shared service centre. I rate my own success as a manager on the development of my direct reports; I’m proud to see many former reports now operating as CFOs and finance directors.

profile_positions.title: Regional Finance Director EMEA

profile_positions.description:
Joined this $3bn revenue global-network provider of customized freight forwarding and supply chain solutions from within the Maersk group to lead the transformation of the finance function for Europe ($800m revenue).

STAKEHOLDER MANAGEMENT FOR PERFORMANCE
•	Reported to Europe region CEO, as finance business partner implemented performance management with regional functional leadership to deliver EBIT growth. Developed restructuring programmes delivering strong cost savings, built cross-functional collaboration with operations contributing productivity growth, and designed customer profitability analysis and revenue leakage review contributing to gross profit growth.
•	Led regional working capital cash drive to generate $100+m cash inflow.

FINANCIAL MANAGEMENT 
Directed the finance function for the Europe region (80 heads in total, 5 direct reports, 8 country-clusters) and captive shared service centre (India). Managed monthly / quarterly / annual financial reporting and external audit, performance reporting, planning, budgeting and analysis, legal and compliance, and internal controls as well as accountability for tax and treasury.

FINANCE TRANSFORMATION
Worked with 8 CFOs covering 20 countries and captive shared service centre (India) to drive full offshoring of accounting and transactional processes. Standardised and automated key processes, and re-directed the focus of country-cluster finance towards value-added business partnering.
profile_positions.title: Regional CFO - Europe

profile_positions.description:
Recruited by this $4bn revenue container shipping infrastructure provider in 70+ key ports globally, reporting to the global head of finance, with initial responsibilities as director of global reporting and control and then head of global FP&A.

FINANCIAL PLANNING & ANALYSIS (FP&A)	 
Redesigned the performance management process including strategic planning, budgeting, rolling forecasts and analysis. Implemented new global consolidation and reporting system (OneStream). Appraised business cases for major infrastructure investment projects. Managed a global cost control programme.
 
M&A INTEGRATION
Applied complex accounting treatments to 3-4 new business arrangements annually: acquisitions, joint ventures, and container terminal concessions (included sign off from external audit), and integration into APMT’s reporting and control process. Included acquisition of joint controlling share in a Russian port operating group, and integration of Maersk Inland Services business unit into APMT.

FINANCIAL MANAGEMENT
Assumed interim role of global Head of Finance for six months. Mentored and developed direct reports at financial controller level to grow into CFO or finance management.

REPORTING & CONTROL
Implemented structured analysis and controlling resulting in step-change improvement in reporting (IFRS), including fast-close project that cut consolidated reporting time from 12 days to 6, a new global internal control structure, and successive clean external audit reviews.
